column1: #Text=Chow says : " You know , San would 've been so proud of you guys !
#Text=We 're supposed to be helping her find airbenders in Ba Sing Se .
#Text=" Chow says : " One of our neighbors started airbending about a week ago .
#Text=A couple days later , two Dai Li agents come out of nowhere and snatch him up .
#Text=" Tu says : " They say the Earth Queen 's locking all the airbenders up somewhere , and using them for experiments .
#Text=Do n't talk like that about Her Majesty !
#Text=" Mako says : " We have to get back to the Upper Ring and tell Korra .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I hope Kai is okay .
